ftbquests.chapter.mob_farming_and_you.ti: Mob Farming and You[--成为怪物农场主--]
ftbquests.chapter.mob_farming_and_you.qu: Such a Pushover[--简单入门--]
&eCyclic&r also offers a &bFan&r[--&e循环&r还提供了&b风扇&r--]
These aren't as powerful, but look very aesthetic[--可能没那么强，但是可以美化你的农场--]
Power them with a Redstone Signal to turn them on![--用红石信号激活它们!--]
&eCyclic's&r Iron Spikes, can be toggled with a &cRedstone Signal&r[--&e循环&r钉刺,可以用&c红石信号&r控制开关--]
&eCyclic's&r Spikes can be upgraded to 3 variants:[--&e循环&r 钉刺可以升级为3个进阶形态:--]
&aCursed&r - Curses the Mob on Contact[--&a诅咒&r - 使上方生物受到诅咒--]
&bDiamond&r - Do increased Damage[--&b钻石&r - 增加钉刺伤害--]
&cFlame&r - Apply Flame Damage on Contact[--&c火焰&r - 使上方生物持续着火--]
Upgraded Spikes[--升级钉刺--]
Moving in the right direction[--向正确的方向移动--]
Instead of pushing the mobs, you can also use these &bVector Plates&r[--你也可以使用这些&b向量板&r来代替风扇去移动怪物--]
&eDark Utilities&r offers these Plates, to directly move the &6Mobs&r that step on them[--&eDark Utilities&r提供了这些板子,可以直接移动站在上面的&6怪物&r--]
These &6Mobs&r also spawn on the &bVector Plates&r, respecting the block underneath[--这些&6怪物&r也会在&b向量板&r上生成--]
Vector Plates[--向量板--]
Minecraft Education Edition?[--Minecraft 教程版?--]
Mobfarming, Lagfree and Scalable...[--怪物农场数字化升级...--]
Craft the &bDeep Learner&r, bind your &6Model Framework&r to a mob, place it in your &bDeep Learner&r and start killing said mobs[--制作&b深度学习器&r,将&6空白数据模型&r与一个生物绑定,将其放入你的&b深度学习器&r中并开始击杀绑定的生物--]
Over time, the Tier on the Data Model will increase and will become more usable[--随着时间的推移,数据模型上的等级将增加,并将更加有用--]
The &bSimulation Chamber&r is one of the main Blocks in &eDeep Mob Learning&r[--&b模拟室&r是&e深度怪物学习&r的重要方块之一--]
Put your &6Data Model&r in here and add in the &6Prediction Matrix&r[--将你的&6数据模型&r放入&6预设矩阵&r中--]
Depending on the stats on your &6Data Model&r you have a certain chance to obtain various Predictions[--取决于你&6数据模型&r上的数据,你一定有几率获得各种预测产物--]
Farm some Nether Mobs[--养殖一些下界生物--]
&6Data Models&r that are bound to Overworld Monsters (Check JEI) will result into &bNether Predictions&r[--&6数据模型&r与下届怪物绑定(检查JEI)将产生&b下界预测产物&r--]
These can be used to craft various Overworld Resources like Ghast Tears, Blaze Rods and Nether Wart[--这些可以用来制作各种下届资源,如恶魂之泪、烈焰棒和下界疣--]
Farm some Overworld Mobs[--养殖一些主世界生物--]
&6Data Models&r that are bound to Overworld Monsters (Check JEI) will result into &bOverworld Predictions&r[--&6数据模型&r与主世界怪物绑定(检查JEI)将产生&b主世界预测产物&r--]
These can be used to craft various Overworld Resources like Gunpowder, Rotten Flesh and Arrows[--这些可以用来制作各种主世界资源,如火药、腐肉和箭--]
Farm some End Mobs[--养殖一些末地生物--]
&6Data Models&r that are bound to Overworld Monsters (Check JEI) will result into &bEnd Predictions&r[--&6数据模型&r与末地怪物绑定(检查JEI)将产生&b末影预测产物&r--]
These can be used to craft various Overworld Resources like Ender Pearls, Chorus Fruit... And even Nether Stars![--这些可以用来制作各种末地资源,比如末影珍珠、紫颂果......甚至下界之星!--]
Feeding your &bLoot Fabricator&r with &6Mob Predictions&r will yield you all kinds of Loot[--将&6预测产物&r投入&b战利品制造器&r将产生各种战利品--]
Just put the &6Predictions&r inside and select the drops you want[--只需要把&6预测产物&r放进去,然后选择你想要的掉落物--]
Mob Predictions[--怪物预测产物--]
Each Mob has its own special &bMob Prediction&r[--每个怪物都有自己的特殊的&b预测产物&r--]
These are specialized drops that can be converted into a specific mob drop inside the &6Loot Fabricator&r[--这些是特殊化掉落物,可以转化为&6战利品制造器&r中的特殊掉落物--]
Random Mob Prediction[--随机怪物预测产物--]
Stepping up your plate[--加速你的向量板--]
Be Careful around these Plates![--小心这些板子!--]
&eDark Utilities&r offers you a few &bDamaging Plates&r that can be used inside your &6Mobfarm&r[--&eDark Utilities&r提供了一些&b伤害板&r,可以在你的&6怪物农场&r中使用--]
&bDamage Plate&r - Damages the Entities[--&b伤害板&r - 对实体造成伤害--]
&dMaim Plate&r - Reduces the Entities Max Health[--&dMaim板&r - 减少实体最大生命值--]
&ePlayer Damage Plate&r - Damages the Entities with Player Damage[--&e玩家伤害板&r - 对实体造成玩家伤害--]
&cFlame Plate&r - Damages the Entities with Fire Damage[--&c火焰板&r - 对实体造成火焰伤害--]
Damaging Plates[--伤害板--]

Bamboo spikes are one of the earliest autokiller methods. They do not kill as a player would but they can be tipped with potions for added effects. Cheap and effective![--竹刺是最早期的自动屠宰解决方案之一。它们不会像玩家那样去杀死怪物,但可以给它们灌注药水来增加效果。低级但有效!--]
